attributes.action: Make voting illegal as it only encourages MP's to think they have any worth in society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Billy Connolly once said,& I quote "Please don't vote for these people... It only encourages them"!!!!LOL. NEVER HAS A MORE TRUE STATEMENT BEEN MADE.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
